title: Firefox for Android 50.0beta Beta

notes.note: Added support for HLS videos via player overlay
Simplified the user interface by combining the Recent Tabs and History panels

system_requirements:
## Operating systems
 - Android 4.0
 - Above versions

## Requirements
 - 50 MB internal storage
 - 384 MB of RAM
 - display at least 320 pixels high and 240 pixels wide
